mapper.select: SELECT * FROM zteacher_command WHERE ztrainingroomID=#{ztrainingroomID} AND ((ztype="签到" OR ztype="查岗" OR ztype="滚屏信息") AND zstatus="有效") ;
SELECT count(*) FROM zteacher_command WHERE ztrainingroomID=#{ztrainingroomID} AND ztype="滚屏信息" AND zstatus="有效" ;

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO zteacher_command (zid, ztrainingroomID, ztype, zcontent ,zpublishtime, zstatus,zscheduleID) VALUES(#{zid},#{ztrainingroomID} , #{ztype}, #{zcontent} ,#{zpublishtime}, #{zstatus},#{zscheduleID});
mapper.delete: delete from zteacher_command where ztrainingroomID= #{ztrainingroomID} and ztype=#{ztype}
